attributes.title: 2022 Kia Picanto 1.2 Street

attributes.description:
At Kia Alberton, we pride ourselves on delivering high quality pre-owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a thorough 125-point quality check, roadworthy and valet.  

The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Alberton Family and family look after each other. We will structure a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too.   

Call now and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you to our showroom to view and test drive the vehicle. 

Finance can be arranged through all major financial institutions, nationwide delivery available and all trade-ins accepted subject to view. Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.title: 2021 Kia Picanto 1.0 Street

attributes.description:
A compact and modern design makes the KIA Picanto perfect for your day-to-day urban driving.
Refreshing design
KIA have taken contemporary design to a new level in the Picanto! Combining a modern honeycomb grille with futuristic backward-swept lights, the design makes it stand out from other hatchbacks in its class. A compact build allows the KIA Picanto to fit in well with any inner-city environment, which invites you to drive with confidence.
Obsessed with peace of mind
From its sturdy frame to the latest in sensor technology, the Picanto is dedicated to protecting you when trouble happens and helps you avoid tricky situations in the first place
.

True Style lies within

It may be a compact car, but the Picantoâ€™ s stylish interior gives you all the space you need to dash about town in comfort. And with ergonomically sound layout that places controls for driving, entertainment and temperature control at your fingertips, you'll never have to take your eyes off the road.
